title: Issue 47 Scenario 4 Expected Behavior
details:
SCENARIO 4: Quick Tab Minimization, Restoration, and Manager

EXPECTED BEHAVIOR:
- Minimize button reduces Quick Tab to minimized manager panel
- Minimized tabs persist across tab switches
- Restore button brings Quick Tab back to viewport
- Minimized state syncs across all tabs
- Manager panel (Ctrl+Alt+Z) shows all minimized tabs

TEST IMPLEMENTATION:
- Create Quick Tab and minimize
- Verify minimized:true in state
- Test restore functionality
- Test cross-tab minimized state synchronization
- Verify state persists across tab switches

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Minimized state must be boolean field in Quick Tab object
- Minimize/restore must sync across all tabs immediately
- No visual glitches during minimize/restore transitions
